proposal_summary: 12 monthly conferences about Cardano for entrepreneurs in Brasil.
proposal_problem: Cryptocurrencies in general and Cardano in particular are not widely known in Brazil
proposal_solution:
Participation would be free
Each event will have:
A keynote presentation on a specific subject
A coffee break and networking time
A workshop intended to agree on lines of action (individual and collective) for the entrepreneurs. This is the time when we can implement the giveaways.

proposal_problem: There is no Bitpay and Coinbase for Cardano
proposal_solution: Found a company to build coinbase for ada

proposal_summary: Implement support for Ledger and Tresor hardware wallets
proposal_problem: Daedalus does not support hardware wallets
proposal_solution: Our team will extend the Daedalus codebase to include support for Trezor and Ledger.

proposal_summary: A fund for blockchain developement in Africa
proposal_solution: A fund like fund0, but dedicated to african initiatives

proposal_problem: It's hard to start a stakepool from scratch
proposal_solution: We will conduct an online course guiding new stakepool operators

proposal_summary: A book on best practices for proposals
proposal_problem: There is no source of knowledge how to develop good proposals
proposal_solution: A 60 pg book containing best pratices and examples

proposal_summary: A single source for essential Cardano information
proposal_solution: (1) Accessible documentation (2) Cardano podcast (3) Weekly newsletter

proposal_summary: I find bugs in projects. Sometimes they're running on mainnet. Sometimes there's a lot of money at stake.
